mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, memberno, title, content, word, rdate, cnt) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{word}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, memberno, title, content, word, rdate, cnt FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno ASC

SELECT noticeno, memberno, title, content, cnt, rdate, replycnt FROM notice
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
ORDER BY noticeno ASC
